CustomField.description: Days from Blackout Start Date to Final Reporting Received
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL( Final_Reporting_Received__c ), TODAY()- Blackout_Start_Date__c , Final_Reporting_Received__c - Blackout_Start_Date__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Days from Blackout Start Date to Final Reporting Received
CustomField.label: Time to Assets & Reporting KPI
